name: TestGlossary
description:
This is a test glossary created for pagination testing purposes. It contains 500 glossary terms to validate large-scale data handling and UI pagination functionality in OpenMetadata.

This glossary serves as a comprehensive test dataset for:

  • Testing pagination performance with large datasets
  • Validating search and filtering capabilities
  • Ensuring proper data loading and display in the UI
  • Testing bulk operations on glossary terms
